about_the_game:
"Get ready to embark on a unique adventure in Dragon Ranch! This cooperative online game invites you to grow your own farm and capture cute monsters in a world full of charm and hidden secrets. Team up with your friends and together explore the vast landscapes in search of clues to an ancient civilization.

Team up with your friends and take on challenging quests to capture the rarest and most valuable monsters. Upgrade your ranch with new facilities, create custom habitats and experiment with genetics to breed even more powerful and unique monsters!

But it's not all work and no play at the ranch. Explore this strange planet full of hidden secrets as you unravel the history and discover the mysteries behind these enigmatic beings.
detailed_description:
"Get ready to embark on a unique adventure in Dragon Ranch! This cooperative online game invites you to grow your own farm and capture cute monsters in a world full of charm and hidden secrets. Team up with your friends and together explore the vast landscapes in search of clues to an ancient civilization.

Team up with your friends and take on challenging quests to capture the rarest and most valuable monsters. Upgrade your ranch with new facilities, create custom habitats and experiment with genetics to breed even more powerful and unique monsters!

But it's not all work and no play at the ranch. Explore this strange planet full of hidden secrets as you unravel the history and discover the mysteries behind these enigmatic beings.
name: Dragon Ranch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dragon Ranch is a first-person open-world co-op game with touches of exploration. In which you can capture and raise adorable monsters and get the resources they generate to improve your facilities, enter the planet and discover the secrets that await you.
